name: Reunion
startIntroPart1: We shall fight for the lives of the Infected.
startIntroPart2: Until all the wrongs have been righted and all our sins purged. It will be done. Even if our end is the same, I will burn it all to ashes. Even if I burn to death!
declaringWar: Your days of oppressing the Infected is over!
attacked: We won't let you harm the Infected ever again!
defeated: We have failed but our will to fight for our people will continue to persevere.
introduction: Fear not, we just want to help those who are Infected.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
